{"rule":"GERMAN_SPELLER_RULE",                     "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
{"rule":"PFEILE",                                  "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
{"rule":"LEERZEICHEN_NACH_VOR_ANFUEHRUNGSZEICHEN", "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
{"rule":"COMMA_PARENTHESIS_WHITESPACE",            "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
{"rule":"GERMAN_WORD_REPEAT_RULE",                 "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
{"rule":"DE_DOUBLE_PUNCTUATION",                   "sentence":"^@startuml .* @enduml .*$"}
